sentences.english: Hitchcock also got a perverse thrill out of taking audiences on a voyeuristic roller-coaster ride.
sentences.chinese: 希区柯克也有有害刺激的考虑受众的偷窥过山车旅程。

sentences.english: The trip west was hard. Many of the people died.
sentences.chinese: 这次西行的旅程非常艰苦，许多人死在了路上。

sentences.english: Think of the long trip home.
Me This journey is the most boring one.
sentences.chinese: 《我》我称这段路为“最枯燥的旅程”？

sentences.english: The voyage lasted 46 minutes, from its departure in Philadephia to its landing across the Delaware River.
sentences.chinese: 从费城出发抵达特拉华河对面的旅程持续了46分钟。

sentences.english: The wandering tour saddens the days with sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 无奈流浪的旅程，让悲伤增添愁苦哀戚的伤痕。

sentences.english: The premier has just completed the first leg of his five-nation tour.
sentences.chinese: 这位总理刚刚结束了他五国之行的第一段旅程。

sentences.english: Luke’s journey to becoming a Jedi Knight would have had a lot more bumps.
sentences.chinese: 卢克成为绝地武士的旅程原本要更加坎坷。

sentences.english: Record the newly-weds honeymoon trip tips and the equipment information.
sentences.chinese: 记录新婚夫妇蜜月旅程的攻略和装备信息。

sentences.english: You only pass by on village on the entire weeklong trip.
sentences.chinese: 为期一整个礼拜的旅程中，你只会经过一个村庄。

sentences.english: That means you need a good connection at the start of a trip.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着用户在旅程开始时必须具备良好的连接信号。

sentences.english: I started my trip at the East Gate Shopping Mall.
sentences.chinese: 我的旅程是在东门购物中心开始的。

sentences.english: If you look back , your journey is ended .
sentences.chinese: 如果你向后看，你的旅程已经终结。

sentences.english: Any health limitations must be explained to your fellow paddlers prior to starting the trip.
sentences.chinese: 任何健康问题都要在开始旅程之前对同伴说明。

sentences.english: It is a story about love journey and grow-up.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个有关爱的旅程和成长的的故事。

sentences.english: Modern railway lines give you a smooth , untroubled journey.
sentences.chinese: 现代的铁路干线将给你一段平稳而无忧的旅程。

definition: journey/course of a journey/distance traveled/trajectory/itinerary/route/course (of history)/stroke (of a piston)/(Tw) (computing) process
to set foot on/to step on or into
